participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and passionate about music, Emma is a vibrant individual who finds joy in expressing herself through art and dance.
participant_1.background: I went to a concert and danced my heart out. My days consist of juggling graduate school, my pregnancy, and my anxiety disorder. I like doing art projects. I work in fast food. I like to wear clothes that make me feel confident and look good.

participant_2.name: Zoe
participant_2.personality: A spiritual and free-spirited individual, Zoe is introspective and values deep connections with others. She embraces life with a unique perspective and a sense of adventure.
participant_2.background: I look for someone who can match my energy and who is also interested in spirituality. I love my spouse for being understanding about my phobia. I tend to argue with myself more than I argue with myself. I am a free spirit, and I live my life according to my own rules. I am only 5 foot tall.

content.text: I love to go to concerts and I love dancing! What about you?
I love going to concerts too! I love the energy of the crowd and the feeling of being in a place with other people who love the same music as me.
I know what you mean! Concerts are the best! What was the last concert you went to?
I went to see The Killers a few months ago and it was AMAZING! They put on such an amazing show and the crowd was just electric.
That's awesome! I've been wanting to see The Killers for years but they never come to my city. I'm so jealous!
I'm sure they'll come to your city eventually! Just keep an eye out for their tour dates.
I will! Thanks for the tip!
No problem! What kind of music do you like to listen to?
I like a lot of different types of music, but my favorite is probably alternative rock.
Me too! I love alternative rock. I also like indie rock and folk music.
Me too! I love all kinds of music.
It's so great to meet someone who loves music as much as I do!
Me too! I love talking about music.
